title: " Unable to connect to authentication service..." Can't login to client
body:
" Unable to connect to authentication service. Check the servers status here. If it looks good, follow the guide."

Help!!!!
I have flushed DNS and ran as administrator, but still no hope.

replies.body:
Those are a couple of good first steps if you ever have problems with your connection, but let's go a few steps further. Instead of only flushing your DNS, make sure you're adjusting your DNS server settings using the steps in this screenshot....

https://i.gyazo.com/a51c6f92b35ca00e4fbab9fc088b93d7.png

and also check out the other steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) while you're at it! Those steps should be able to get you a smoother connection to our login servers but definitely hit me back up if those don't get you back in the game.

didn't work!

I don't know what else it could be.  I have a filter called Covenant Eyes, which I checked and doesn't seem to be blocking the site or anything.

Hmmmm I'm not sure if that web-filter would be blocking your network from being able to access our servers, but getting that authentication message means that something is preventing you from reaching those servers regardless. Go ahead and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure you send them some network logs you can generate using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). They'll be able to look through those logs to see what else might be going on!

I downloaded league on and older cpu with the filter "covenant eye", however i was able to login into the client. Though i doubt the cpu has the ability to run the game well. So the problem is not with the filter... WHAT IS THE PROBLEM?!?!?!! ANYONE????
